modName: SMCP - Skyrim More Crafting Project WIP
descriptionHtml:
SMCP - Skyrim More Crafting Project WIP
--------------------------------
This modding Project adds stuff like Anvils and Enchanters in your houses in Skyrim!
Current Version only Covers Breezehome and VlindrelHall but more is comming soon!
--------------------------------
 :: r1 ::
::::::::::::
-Breezehome
+ Enchanter
+ Anvil
+ Armor Workbench
+ Sharpening Wheel
+ Tanning Rack
+ Extra Chest
+ Extra \"TreasAlchemyStachelRare\"
Also on Steamworkshop :: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12765] *link*[/url]
::::::::::::
-VlindrelHall
+ Anvil
+ Armor Workbench
+ Sharpening Wheel
+ Tanning Rack
+ Extra Chest
Also on Steamworkshop :: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12944] *link*[/url]
::::::::::::
-Proudspire Manor [Â© Zelle 2012]
+ Forge
+ Sharpening Wheel
+ Armor Workbench
+Tranning Rack
+ Extra Chest
+ Smith
Also on Steamworkshop :: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11656] *link*[/url]
--------------------------------
Also: This is my first ever mod using the Creation Kit, so tell me about every bug you find!
--------------------------------
author: LinkPlay9
